name: Private Arsenal
desc: A secure facility that grants access to all weapons and fighter wings discovered by the player's faction. Available only on player-owned colonies, it provides a private arms market without affecting the local economy.

name: Reverse Engineering Hub
desc: As the sector is decaying in knowledge an institution specialized in the disassembly of functional spacecraft is a rare sight, and can only be afforded by the rich or the desperate. Place ships into the storage to reverse engineer them. Once you have achieved 100% progress on a hull, install a blueprint to overwrite it.
